607540.name: Outbreak Demo
607540.description:
Experience a small slice of the apocalypse in the single-player Outbreak demo! Learn the basics of survival by playing through the Tutorial campaign scenario as Mason. Once you're ready, take on the first portion of the Captive Nightmares scenario as Quies attempts to escape a horrifying prison. This demo includes all mouse, keyboard and gamepad control options from the full version.

Purchase the full game to gain access to the complete Campaign (5 scenarios including the Tutorial) and Onslaught Mode (10 scenarios) which are playable in single-player and online coop. In the full game, you'll have control over the character (7 to choose from), difficulty (three brutal modes), new starting equipment and more cosmetic options! The full game also includes the Nightmares single-player narrative experience which harkens back to a more classic survival horror experience. Grab three more friends and take on the full Outbreak experience together in the full game!
